text:
Ahh, nothing...
...I just though you might be tired.

I mean,
I literally just finished a performance.

A, ahh.....
Haha, of course.... Sorry.

......Ha...
Either way, it's about that isn't it?

I'll go ahead and say it.
You don't have time to waste being concerned for Fuyu.

Because right now, no matter how you look at it,
the busiest one of all of us is Asahi.

Since that girl is giving her all out there,
you should have your hands full keeping up with her.

...I won't deny that
but still, Fuyuko...

Yes yes, I'm grateful for your concern,
but this and that are separate issues.

Understanding demands and procedures is also part of an Idol's job.
Fuyu will do her best to do what she can as Fuyu.
